IP if server 208.43.79.147 (http://www.xilisoft.com/) that it tries  to phone home to.  You "can" update your computer host file to block it if you don't want to use a firewall. But regardless this is a dead app with out a crack.

This serial has been black listed. with out a crack it will work. 2) Use the following serial to register the program:

CODE: 1A77-F1B4-A5C5-ECA9-C8AC-B199-CC82-5F00

3) Untick "Check for updates automatically" in preferences
